name: The Avenues KinderCare
description: They offer specialized preschool programs that build off of children's natural curiosity and wonder in addition to our engaging and accessible toddler, preschool, and kindergarten programs. The program provides morning snack, lunch and afternoon snack. We provide a day full of thematic learning opportunities. Including Learning Adventure opportunities with SF Soccer Shots, PE class with KidoKinetics, and Spanish class with Hola Amigos. Every day, the center staff works hard to build confidence i
